article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-17fuaTB hentry entry story-marquee-standard

h2.a: Facebook's 'Phone' Is Another Triumph Of Mediocrity

div.p: Maybe you were hoping for something radically new and different from a Facebook phone. If so, Zuck just broke your heart.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ftRfIs hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Roger Ebert's Winning 'New Yorker' Cartoon Caption

div.p: To the delight of film fans, film-criticism fans, Caption Contest fans, and Roger Ebert fans—and count me among all of the above—Mr. Ebert fulfilled his quest to win "The New Yorker" Caption Contest.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-14Q7Ws2 hentry entry story-col-1

header.div: POTATO GOES IN, CHIP COMES OUT

h2.a: 67 Years Of Potato Chip Innovation, In 5 Animated GIFs

div.p: Americans spend less on groceries than they did a few decades ago. That's partly because of technology that have made it much cheaper to produce food. We went to the Herr's potato chip factory to see some of this food-making technology in action.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10fFJXu hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Never Lose The Most Important Photos – Or Videos – Again

div.p: We all have moments we want to remember for the rest of our lives, but we're not all keeping those memories safe. Picturelife makes showing and backing up all your photos and videos as easy as taking them. If you haven't given them a shot, here's your chance.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-O3IBAJ hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Roger Ebert On The Aurora Shooting: We've Seen This Before

div.p: I’m not sure there is an easy link between movies and gun violence. I think the link is between the violence and the publicity.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-14EV87q hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: The Proper Way To Eat A Pig

div.p: In this farm-to-table era, community-supported-agriculture shares — in which families purchase farm goods through a weekly subscription — have become increasingly popular.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10BN0xB hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: This Map Of America's Female Mortality Rates Is Pretty Terrifying

div.p: This map, via health researcher Bill Gardner, shows the change in mortality rate for females in each county in the United States between 1992 and 2006.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XTd4s8 hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: 10 Movies Roger Ebert Really Hated

div.p: Roger Ebert passed away today at age 70. Back in 2010, Stacy Conradt rounded up some of his best bad reviews. Let's revisit those today as we mourn the first film critic to win a Pulitzer Prize and one of our favorite people on Twitter.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10BiwMd hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: A Brief History Of Touchscreen Technology

div.p: The beginnings of capacitive, resisitive, and multitouch screens.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-r0Rdf hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Roger Ebert's Epic Takedown Of 'Transformers: Revenge Of The Fallen'

div.div: I will always remember @EbertChicago for this epic, epic 'Transformers' takedown rogerebert.suntimes.com/apps/p...

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Z4i6hr hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Classical Portraits Of Extreme Plastic Surgery

div.p: Phillip Toledano’s photos in his series “A New Kind of Beauty” have many traits of a traditional portrait, but his subjects are far from average. Toledano documents people who have gone through radical reconstructive plastic surgery.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XY8kgn hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: A Few Crazy College Fees That Are Driving Education Online

div.p: College tuition has increased a mind-boggling 1,210% in 30 years. According to the College Board, the average debt of college graduates is a whopping $13,600, growing at 2.1% beyond inflation since 2005. Compounding the problem is a mountain of hidden fees.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10zHDAi hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Rest In Peace, Roger

div.p: Roger Ebert, who was without question America's most prominent and influential film critic, has died.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XSJanU hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Georgia High School Students Fight For First-Ever Integrated Prom

div.p: Wilcox County High School has two proms: one for white students and one for non-white students.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZEHx hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Roger Ebert On The Beauty Of The Rice Cooker

div.p: First, get the Pot. You need the simplest rice cooker made. It comes with two speeds: Cook, and Warm. Not expensive. Now you're all set to cook meals for the rest of your life on two square feet of counter space, plus a chopping block.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-11r0mAD hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Being Gay At Jerry Falwell's University

div.p: A former student's account of coming out at Liberty University.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZdLUht hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: How To Hide $8.3 Billion

div.p: Matthew Taylor was able to amass an $8.3 billion long position before anyone else noticed in what are called “e-mini futures,” which bet that the S&P 500 will rise in the future. Unfortunately, that didn’t really work out for him, and now he’s probably off to jail.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-16sTsuf hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Every Human Has A 'Breathprint' – What Does Yours Say About You?

div.p: The chemical signature in your breath is unique to you, and may even be as distinctive as your fingerprint. In fact, researchers think your "breathprint" could soon be used to determine your true identity, or diagnose you with an illness.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Xs7rSg hentry entry story-col-2

header.div: YOU KNOW, THE GUY WITH THE SCAR

h2.a: 'Game Of Thrones' Mnemonics For Character Names

div.p: No more looking like an idiot when you confuse Talisa with Khaleesi.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-13TWQ5N hentry entry story-col-0

header.div: SAFE AS MONEY IN THE BANK

h2.a: World's Largest Bitcoin Exchange: We Are Suffering A Massive Attack On Our Servers

div.p: Yesterday, the world's first and largest Bitcoin exchange, Mt. Gox, had an outage, and users couldn't access the trading platform. Now they've told the world what went wrong.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZC3MvE hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Meet The Foursquare Mayors Of Top-Secret Washington

div.p: Just because you work in or visit a highly classified, black-budget spy agency, doesn’t mean you can’t have mad Foursquare cred.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10yZJCM hentry entry story-col-2

header.div: MIGHT SIDE WITH NORTH KOREA ON THIS ONE

h2.a: Here’s The Japanese Song So Offensive It Took North Korea’s Focus Off The U.S.

div.p: For the last two weeks, North Korean media has been wholly consumed with escalating tensions against the U.S., so the fact that they set aside an entire daily commentary for the song suggests that they might really, sincerely be incensed by it.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10ztNhx hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: A Total Facebook-ification Of Your Phone

div.p: The social network dials up a new way to hook people on its mobile phone software.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10val6G hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: How Far Those North Korean Missiles Can Actually Reach In One Map

div.p: So, how far can those missiles actually reach?

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-13TMOkQ hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Being The Jew In The Box

div.p: To have conversations with Germans about Jews, I had to become an exhibition at Berlin’s Jewish Museum.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XrCJcf hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: How Bad Is the Job Market For College Grads? Your Definitive Guide

div.p: Young bachelor's holders are hurting. But they're still doing better than high-school grads, and their crisis has been vastly overstated.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YUQ372 hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: These Pictures Of A Human Tower Competition Are Insane

div.p: Photographer David Oliete got a pretty unique perspective in 2012, shooting the entire event at what appears to be a nearly aerial position.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10egGUf hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Where Is the Most Expensive Place To Own a Car?

div.p: This chart shows the total cost of buying a family car (an average of low- and high-end brands) in selected cities in 2010, then running it for three years.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-101TjND hentry entry story-col-0

header.div: JUST LIKE 'THE GAME' BUT YOU'RE NOT RICH

h2.a: What It's Like To Be Kidnapped... For Fun

div.p: Why on earth would someone pay hundreds of dollars to fly halfway across the country for the pleasure of being abducted by thugs, handcuffed in a basement for hours, and forced to pee into a Gatorade bottle?

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-16rJadG hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Why Evil Origin Stories Suck

div.p: When you have a built in audience, it’s far easier to get butts into seats. This has led to the rise of a particular kind of narrative – the “Evil Origin Story.” The formula is (theoretically) simple: take an iconic villain that people already love (to hate) and explain how they got to be that way.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZcXsl8 hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Juggalos Are Humans Too

div.p: Sometimes it’s hard being a Juggalo. The media hates you. The band you love is, to many, nothing but a laughing stock. And recently, even the FBI classified your kind as a criminal gang.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Zc0MwK hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Inside Apple's Plans For Its Futuristic, $5 Billion HQ

div.p: Most big construction projects tend to run a bit over budget and a bit behind schedule. Apple being Apple, this project is far bigger than most and therefore far over budget and behind schedule.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10xMiTn hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Armstrong To Make Another Comeback

div.p: Disgraced cyclist Lance Armstrong will make another comeback. But this time, it's in a sport you probably wouldn't guess.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-11meFGP hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: China’s Secret Battlefields

div.p: Onlookers say it resembles the aftermath of a bombing raid—and it does, except bombs aren’t this precise.
